rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with modern reception design incorporating Vastu principles, using a welcoming color palette and materials.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen. It features modern furnishing, ample natural light through large windows oriented towards the East for positive energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area. Equipped with modern appliances, natural light from an East-facing window, and adherence to Vastu by placing the cooking zone in the South-East corner.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with attached bathroom, ideally located in the North-West to enhance calmness and privacy. Windows oriented for optimal natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom with sufficient space and ample ventilation, oriented towards the North-East for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with natural light, designed to be functional and airy. Oriented towards the North.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-designed bathroom adjoining master bedroom, ensuring privacy and comfort. Uses modern fixtures and natural light where possible.

rooms.name: Study
rooms.description: A modern study area with ample lighting, positioned in a quiet corner of the house, ideally oriented towards the North for concentration.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Dedicated guest room that can double as an office or study, placed strategically in the North-East to align with Vastu for positive energies.

openings.description: Modern entrance with ample space for vehicles and visitors. Incorporates Vastu principles by facing the South to invite positive energy.
Door leading directly into the living room/kitchen area, designed to enhance natural light and airflow.
Large windows in bedroom areas for maximum morning sunlight and adherence to Vastu principles.
Provides access to the garden and swimming pool area, offering a seamless indoor-outdoor experience.

garden.description: Large landscaped garden with native plants and space for outdoor activities, designed to promote relaxation and adherence to Vastu principles of nature integration.

swimming_pool.description: Modern swimming pool integrated into the landscape design, providing a recreational amenity while respecting safety margins as per local building norms.
